name: Protect Arthur!
description:
What would you do to protect your child? 

In the shoes of Raphael, defend the house that shelter your son Arthur from the evil invocations of Mordred, the Druid. Rediscover your priorities, strengthen your defenses, understand your limitations, and defeat all enemies to ensure the life of the one you love the most.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move the player

Space - Shoot

Right Click - Move the camera

Left Click - Construct / Upgrade

R - Rotate the barrier/catapult

Shift - Run

HOW TO PLAY:

Build your barriers around the house and try to upgrade them as you collect materials,  focus on building some catapults as soon as possible so you could get a chance to fight the boss.

NOTES: 

This is a submissionto the Weekly Game Jam 152, the theme is "Shelter", we know that there are some issues but we're proud of it!
